html:
7.5.18  1:22 pm   why are you so evil man

      i am not but why are you

7.5.18  11:33 am   have you ever been to Pyongyang?

     yes but the next challenge is to get out

7.5.18  11:09 am   where do u stand on the current dinosaur debate

     i think they were real

7.5.18  10:31 am   the home planet says hello. what should they do?

     look for more planets!

7.5.18  10:29 am   opinion on grass?

     it certainly grows at a medium pace

7.5.18  10:26 am   What's a good way to share the songs you write?

     play them or record them? you can play them to specific people or else put them online so that people can listen as desired

7.5.18  10:25 am   should i bake the bread, or grill the toast?

      how about toast the bread and bake the grill

7.5.18  10:24 am   Is there any way to prove that time passes and hasn't already passed but we're too slow to catch up?

      time is required to say or think the word 'prove', i don't know where that factors into the scenario

7.5.18  9:57 am   we're all our own heroes, arent we

     yes, and others'

7.5.18  9:38 am   Do you ever have existential crises? I had one yesterday, just collapsed on my front porch because I thought about the fact that no matter what we all do, one day the human race will be gone and nobody will ever know our achievements...

     i'm not following your reasoning there

     
Also do you prefer fresh sandwiches or toast?

     how about a toast sandwich. for the folks at home that's a piece of toast between 2 pieces of bread

7.5.18  9:21 am   should i stop?

     normally i would say no, but in this rare case i would say absolutely yes

7.5.18  8:48 am   I don't know anything about music and I still make music, and people like it.  

     it sounds like you know all about music

     But now I'm out of ideas.  wha t d0

     try going deep in the jungle .......

7.5.18  7:36 am   Bill, do you ever read the comments on your YouTube videos?

     yes, i hang them all on my fridge!

7.5.18  6:42 am   should i exist

     sure

7.5.18  3:53 am   how do you push yourself to work when you don't feel motivated?

     there would be no need for that. the question is how do i push myself when i am motivated

7.5.18  2:16 am   capital letters. how do you feel?

     fine

7.5.18  2:04 am   how would you define a business relationship

     you could use a contract

7.5.18  2:01 am   how would you feel

      i would have mixed feelings

7.5.18  2:00 am   don't you just simply love hamsters

     it's not quite that simple

7.4.18  11:58 pm   7.1.18  5:28 am Bill, my friend, you are wrong. There are much more people than one. In fact I bet people have memorized more of your songs than you have.

     that may be true but no one knows them all because i'm the only one who has heard them all and i have not memorized them all

      Because you don't actively listen to your own songs on a daily/weekly/monthly basis. You go on to the next song, right? So just by odds people know the words to your songs more than you. P.S. This is all speculation. I just know I personally know many of your recent songs by heart.

7.4.18  10:48 pm   Are you still too small for the mall, or have you grown since writing that song?

     that would be an example of the use of fiction, in song writing

7.4.18  10:20 pm   favorite monty python sketch?

     fish slap

7.4.18  9:39 pm   What chord progressions do your songs usually consist of

     Amin, F, C, G

7.4.18  8:48 pm   WHAT THE HELL IS ANTIMATTER THOUGH

     sounds like some kind of excuse for something

7.4.18  8:39 pm   struggling to understand spacetime. i know that it's here, and i know that it's now, because of course it is, where or when else would it be if i exists (and it does), but does the fact that it exists prove anything else? you really can't climb another rung on that ladder. it just does exists because it does, because as far as we know, it's the only thing that can. but why? frustrating you can't really learn anything else from that, or even guess.

     it's you

7.4.18  8:29 pm   whats the best thing since sliced bread?

     diced bread

7.4.18  6:38 pm   do you know of any good ways to get better lyric writing skills?

     write 10,000 bad lyrics first. there is a special prize once you have done that. don't forget to use music

7.4.18  6:02 pm   do you like roosters

     they're ok

7.4.18  5:36 pm   have you ever just,,,stuck your hand in a bowl full of paper clips,,,, it's exhilarating

     only if they are fresh

7.4.18  5:30 pm   sometimes i have existential crisis' and worry about everything but at the same time I don't. what do I do cause it's tiring u feel

     become a singer/songwriter?

7.4.18  4:39 pm   Ever considered updating the instrumentals page with songs like "hello sexy pants" or "the day goes on" ?

     i don't consider those songs instrumentals

7.4.18  4:34 pm   Sooooo, I tried to play Schumann's Toccata in C Major Op. 7 on synths....pretty sure I ended up making a egg, ham, and cheese sandwich instead. How did I get to that point?

     someone will have to review the security tape

7.4.18  4:14 pm   hot weather or cold weather

     both are going on right now

7.4.18  2:35 pm   I have been looking for "rabbit snakes" on your video list for quite a while and I couldn't find it. Could you help me?

     there is no video for rabbit snakes

7.4.18  1:33 pm   How to build fence?

     stick a stick to a stick. then stick more sticks to those sticks. congratulations that's a fence

7.4.18  1:08 pm   Back in 2016 I'm pretty sure I saw you at a Walmart store buying bananas. Why were you buying bananas?

     because it wasn't me

7.4.18  1:01 pm   how much peanut butter does it take?

     does what take

7.4.18  12:52 pm   What's going on is in E major, not Eb! At least the studio version is in E. 

     that's true, i was actually thinking of let's get it on, which was on my mind due to the ed sheeran law suit

7.4.18  12:42 pm   what questions have you answered lately?

     see below

7.4.18  12:03 pm   why do i watch your videos

     why do i make them

7.4.18  11:34 am   will you work on despacito 2?

     it is already done, all the way up to despacito 10. they will be released annually on the disney channel

7.4.18  11:30 am   have you ever rode a roller coaster

     i live in one

7.4.18  11:15 am   Where is the greenest grass.

     iceland?

7.4.18  10:33 am   My fridge is too full of napkins to put my art in it. Should I put it in the freezer instead?

     can you move the napkins to the freezer

7.4.18  8:39 am   if someone calls one a "loser", what are they saying that person is losing at? life?

     it is a challenge, to see which person is worse

7.4.18  7:04 am   u ever just turn water into wine

     it would be nice to turn more things into water

7.4.18  5:20 am   Hey Bill, i'm kinda in a loop of self deprication because no matter what I try to come up with songwise nothing good comes out of there, and when I try my best I just quit halfway through cause i'm afraid i'll ruin the song somehow (bad mixing, overused chords, the latter shouldn't be a problem I know but i still fear that). I read a while ago that to do something good you said to an asker to make something really terrible on purpose and that'll give me results, well i've tried it but nothing comes out of this, any ways I could get some advice?

     you already took my advice. that advice you just took was my advice

     I really love playing, listening to music, it's my life now and I wanna be an ace at it.

7.4.18  5:16 am   have you ever had ideas while sleeping?

     yes

7.4.18  4:36 am   Hypothetically, would you?

     how about for real

7.4.18  3:29 am   how do I aks questions?

     so far you are doing great
